short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture resources domain used on the current site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that will show domains that are used on a webpage. To be used with proxy config or other times you need to get all the domains the site accesses.
Start it, then just click around on the page. The extension will capture new domains that are accessed.
